H1.text: who scored the most points in a single game in the nba. Michael Jordan

H2.text: who scored the most points in a single game in the nba. LeBron James

H3.text: who scored the most points in a single game in the nba. Wilt Chamberlain

A4.text: Chamberlain is best remembered as the only player to score 100 points in a single game.

A5.text: On March 2, 1962, on a neutral court against the New York Knicks in Hershey, Pennsylvania, Chamberlain scored 100 points.
